ISSUE.TITLE: Filtering by specification attributes. We should process options of the same attribute with "OR" condition
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now we handle all specified specification attributes with "AND" condition. But two options are specified from the same attribute (e.g. "red" and "green" options of "color" attribute), then we should process them with "OR" condition [AM] Do not forget to support "sql compact"
